title: Debate Coach: Biden barely passed, but Trump failed
The Americas are at risk of polio outbreak due to disruptions by the pandemic, experts say
description: Health experts fear an outbreak of the polio virus in the Americas during the Covid-19 pandemic due to a delay in vaccinations and surveillance.

title: A notoriously secretive US agency just paid a record $114 million to a whistleblower
description: Someone just scored a $114 million payday -- without playing the lottery or stepping into a casino. Instead, the check was signed by Uncle Sam.

title: Matthew McConaughey reveals the origin of his catchphrase
description: Actor and author Matthew McConaughey tells CNN's Anderson Cooper how his famous unscripted catchphrase, "Alright, alright, alright," came to him in his first movie, "Dazed and Confused." Watch "Full Circle" every Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 6pm ET.

title: Trump returns to much-changed Mar-a-Lago
description: In Mar-a-Lago's disco-lit main ballroom, he watched as a large crowd serenaded his son's girlfriend while sparklers flared. On the stone dining patio, he hosted the Brazilian President for talks as diners sat at tables nearby, crammed together like normal. Eager to appear like everything was fine, he shook hands and spoke at close range with members and guests, which that weekend included a roster of congressmen, Fox News personalities and family members.

title: Trump supporters in Illinois react to final presidential debate
description: CNN's Elle Reeve speaks with Trump supporters in Illinois as they watch the final debate between President Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Joe Biden.

title: 'Murder hornet' nest believed to be first in US
description: If you thought giant "murder hornets" had disappeared because they dropped from the headlines, you are mistaken.

title: Bellingcat: Russian scientists secretly developing Novichok nerve agent, and working with military intelligence
description: The investigative group Bellingcat has uncovered new details about Russia's development of the Novichok nerve agent, which was used against the former Russian agent Sergei Skripal in England in 2018 and the Russian opposition leader Alexey Navalny in August.

title: Elton John inspires new look for iconic toy
description: Elton John is getting his very own Barbie doll, and while the doll won't look like the Rocket Man, it will be styled in his likeness.

title: Antwaun Sargent continues to champion Black photographers -- this time in 'Just Pictures'
description: Over the past few years, a number of young Black photographers have made their mark on the art world, and critic, writer and curator Antwaun Sargent has made it his mission to cement their legacies.

title: See the uncomfortable question Trump asked Netanyahu
description: After announcing that Israel and Sudan have agreed to normalize relations, President Donald Trump asked Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to weigh in on the ongoing US election.

title: Jack White buys a busker a new guitar after a passerby smashed his old one
description: When Matt Grant was out busking on the streets of Edinburgh, Scotland on Tuesday, "the worst thing that could have happened happened."

title: Green puppy born with litter of white siblings
description: As a sheep farmer, Cristian Mallocci might be accustomed to the occasional black sheep amongst his flock.

title: Jimmy Kimmel shares update on his son and encourages viewers to 'vote with your heart'
description: Advocating for the importance of health care for people with preexisting conditions, Jimmy Kimmel on Thursday revisited a difficult time for his family and encouraged viewers to "vote with your heart" in the upcoming election.

title: Austria's postal service is printing special Covid-19 stamps -- on toilet paper
description: If 2020 could take the form of an object, it would surely be toilet paper.

title: The greatest goal ever scored? Record-breaking strike leaves soccer fans in awe
description: It needs to be seen to be believed.

title: A fourth-grader walked to school to use its WiFi because he didn't have internet at home
description: A fourth-grader in Roswell, New Mexico, has been walking to his shuttered elementary school to do his classwork over the building's WiFi because he didn't have internet access at home.

title: Undecided voters say who they will vote for after final debate
description: A panel of undecided voters speak to CNN's Gary Tuchman after the final 2020 presidential election debate between President Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Joe Biden.

title: Tens of millions across Europe brace for tough new restrictions as coronavirus cases soar
description: Tens of millions more people across Europe face tougher coronavirus restrictions going into the weekend as countries across the region battle to bring down rising infection rates.

title: Why Chileans want to kill their constitution
description: For a country at peace, Chile has seen plenty of recent turmoil. Churches were set ablaze and hundreds arrested during protests in the capital Santiago last weekend, nearly a year after at least 26 people died in fierce clashes over a transit fare hike.

title: On a dark road in Georgia, a stranger cried for help
description: Five days after the roadside incident, I took my first coronavirus test. I felt weary and brittle, my head and joints aching, a flickering pain in my heart.

title: Jon Rahm: World No. 1 ranking better achievement than winning a major
description: If it hadn't been for the 1997 Ryder Cup, Jon Rahm might never have tried golf.

title: This Mexican town has regained its 'magic' status
description: Getting your magic back is possible -- even in 2020.

title: America's longest flight is back
description: Here's a little holiday cheer: Hawaii is opening back up.

title: 'The King': Brazilian soccer great Pele turns 80
description: Few players have touched the game of soccer like Pele.

title: Images reveal new insights about Jupiter's volcanic moon Io
description: Jupiter's third-largest moon Io is covered by more than 400 active volcanoes, and it's the most volcanically active world in our solar system.

title: Apple is offering new ways to purchase the iPhone 12 as it hits the shelves
description: The new iPhone hits shelves on Friday, and that usually means fans lining up outside Apple Stores around the world.

title: Late-night comedians give their take on the final debate
description: Late-night hosts Jimmy Kimmel, Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Fallon look at some of the debate moments between President Donald Trump and Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden.

title: Could this technology get us back to the office?
description: If businesses are to get reluctant workers back into the office, finding ways to maintain social distancing will be key. An Israeli company thinks it can help, using smart sensors mounted on workplace ceilings.

title: China's Xi Jinping delivers thinly veiled swipe at US
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping has warned that "blackmailing, blocking and extreme pressure" will lead to "nowhere but a dead end" in a thinly-veiled attack on the United States, during a speech commemorating China's entry into the Korean War 70 years ago.

title: CNN Poll: Biden wins final presidential debate
description: Joe Biden did a better job in the final debate on Thursday according to a CNN Instant Poll of debate watchers. Overall, 53% of voters who watched the debate said that Biden won the matchup, while 39% said that President Donald Trump did.

title: Japanese craft breweries are turning unsold beer into gin
description: This was going to be a big year for Japan. With the Summer Olympics due to be hosted in Tokyo, the island nation expected 40 million tourists to grace its shores.

title: Fact checking the final 2020 presidential election debate
description:
• Election 101: Here's everything you need to know before Nov. 3
• Analysis: Trump handed Biden a devastating debate attack earlier today

title: Coronavirus pandemic again dominates face-off between President Trump and Joe Biden
description: President Donald Trump enters the final presidential debate on Thursday in need of a major shakeup that will change the trajectory of the race as he trails Joe Biden in both national polls and key swing states that will determine whether he has a path to victory in the Electoral College.

title: Uber and Lyft must reclassify drivers as employees, appeals court finds
description: In a blow to Uber and Lyft, a California appeals court said Thursday that the companies must reclassify their drivers as employees rather than independent contractors, affirming an earlier court decision.

title: Analysis: Hits and misses from the final presidential debate
description: President Donald Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden held an actual debate on Thursday night in Nashville, Tennessee -- the final time the two candidates will share the stage before the November 3 election.

title: Pandemic causing 'unacceptable' shortages in US drug supplies, report says
description: The coronavirus pandemic is causing "unacceptable" shortages of US drug supplies in the United States, according to a report from the Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy (CIDRAP) at the University of Minnesota.

title: Daniel Dale: Trump was better behaved, but he lied more
description: CNN's Daniel Dale fact-checks key moments from the final presidential debate between President Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Joe Biden. See more CNN Facts First fact checks here.

title: At this bookstore in Taiwan, visitors shop in the dark
description: Remember when you used to sneak a flashlight under the covers so you could read a book after bedtime? A bookshop in Taiwan promises you a similar experience.

title: Opinion: This was actually a real debate
description: Commentators share their thoughts on the second and final presidential debate on Twitter in real time.

title: 'I ran because of you!': Trump sounds off at Biden
description: President Donald Trump exclaimed, "I ran because of you," to former Vice President Joe Biden during the final presidential debate of the 2020 election. Check out more CNN debate coverage here.

title: Kentucky governor calls on AG to release 'everything' from Breonna Taylor grand jury
description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear late Thursday called on the state attorney general to release "all information" related to the Breonna Taylor grand jury proceedings.

title: Trump's response about responsibility surprises Biden
description: President Donald Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden debate the handling of coronavirus during the final presidential debate of the 2020 election. Check out more CNN debate coverage here.

title: Toddler goes viral stealing mom's phone
description: Nobody likes to have their phone stolen ... unless it's stolen by your own toddler in the middle of your TikTok dance. Video of an adorable theft delighted the internet and inspired people to post other babies (and a pet fox) swiping phones. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.

title: Europe fights a seemingly unstoppable second wave of Covid-19
